product_name: Stanley Stainless-Steel Evolution Water Bottle - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Stanley Stainless-Steel Evolution Water Bottle has a thumb-activated button that lets you to grip and sip naturally while you're on the trail or at work. Built with stainless steel and proprietary eCycle(R) polypropylene material, the bottle is dishwasher safe; lid disassembles to allow for a complete clean. Center push button lets you grip naturally to open, drink and close all with 1 hand. 18/8 single-wall stainless steel won't rust; naturally BPA-free. Wide mouth fits ice and makes the bottle easy to clean. Closeout.
short_description: The Stanley Stainless-Steel Evolution Water Bottle has a thumb-activated button that lets you to grip and sip naturally while you're on the trail or at work.
